pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, December 2, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, December 2, 2016:

Toronto, Ontario

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at Elementary Teachers of Toronto Federation Day 2016 and will participate in a Q&A.

Toronto Congress Centre
North Building
650 Dixon Rd
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:45 a.m.
  • Media should arrive using the north entrance


Media appearance

2:15 p.m. ET - The Prime Minister will participate in a meeting with the Toronto Star Editorial Board.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
